command.errors.invalid_arguments: Error: The arguments provided are incorrect. Please input valid arguments.
errors.permission.nopermission: You don't have permission to run this command!
generic.on_enable_message: {PLUGIN} is powered by Mikedeejay2Lib, a collection of open source resources for developers to use.
warnings.big_number: Warning: The number you entered is above the recommended limit and might act oddly.
errors.player_required: Error: You must be a player to run this command.
errors.number_required: Error: A number is required to run this subcommand.
errors.number_less_than_zero: Error: The number entered was less than 0. Please enter a number greater than 0.
errors.not_a_number: Error: The data entered is not a number. Please enter a number.
errors.invalid_item_held: The item that is being held is invalid. Please hold a valid item.
errors.version_not_valid: The server's Minecraft version ({VERSION}) is not a valid version for this plugin. Errors may occur.
update_checker.error.invalid_url: Unable to access api.github.com to check for updates! Update checking will not occur.
update_checker.error.cant_open: Could not access api.github.com to check for updates. Update checking will not occur.
update_checker.error.cant_close: Unable to close stream to api.github.com. Update checking will not occur.
update_checker.new_version: {PLUGIN} has a new version {VERSION} available for download.
